flawed_nl_solution:
He contacted 1-0.4=<<1-0.4=0.6>>0.6 of his friends
So he contacted 100*0.6=<<100*0.6=60>>60 people
So he removes 60/2=<<60/2=30>>30 people
So he has 100-30=<<100-30=72>>72 friends left
#### 72

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 70, not 72. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
